urls.description: Flair Airlines is here to change the way Canadians travel. Learn more about Flair Airlines, our low fares across Canada, and book your flights!

data.text: @yulaeroport to @FLLFlyer! Book Now! https://t.co/uvRDSNB2yj https://t.co/HPI2wYWcJj
@timquerengesser Send us a DM or use the contact us form on the website. Send us flight details or booking number along with the request.
💚💚💚 https://t.co/qc0Tys643o

RT @FlyYKF: Checkout Fort Lauderdale this Fall via YKF to @FLLFlyer! Here's 5 fun facts:

-Sits at the western tip of the Bermuda Triangle…
@morgannn_miller Yes. It will take time given the high volume of communications. The DM feeds directly into the customer support system, so you are in the queue.
@morgannn_miller Send us a DM with your voucher number and details.

@4139Design We definitely want to learn more as our IT folks are trying to replicate and solve. Can you please email us support@flyflair.com with some screen shots and specs on the type of OS, browser, etc.? Include your contact info too. Thx.
@Call_Her_Erica https://t.co/79MVRygrpy
@nurse_chanty Send us a SM or email. Include your booking number and details of what you need changed.
@BlueJaysDad We’re Canada’s independent ULCC and we’re growing! Currently we fly to 20 destinations in CAN and adding 5 this fall in US. And 13 new aircraft joining our fleet. https://t.co/uvRDSNB2yj
En vedette! Fort Lauderdale est maintenant sur la liste. Nous proposerons des vols sans escale à partir du mois d’octobre. https://t.co/nBaYdJWQGP https://t.co/7V2fChR4lk
Coming in hot! Fort Lauderdale is now on the list. Flying non-stop starting this fall. https://t.co/kRkz6mus1f https://t.co/eCzvsDbOEH
@borderlinefemme Send us a DM with your booking number and full details. Otherwise, arrive early and they can assist at the counter.
@kmottawa We’ve got our team looking into the issue and our customer service will be in touch to get you booked. Sorry for the frustrating experience.
@ashleyandtravel Sorry about the issue, please send us a DM so we can get you booked and get details so we can get this bug fixed.
@You_Want_Some__ @AeroimagesChris 6 of 13. Number 7 coming soon.
Another new ride coming home to Canada. And those wing tips 🔥#flairsnewride https://t.co/URmOXvP7mo
@_RobertLowe Soon. And no charge.
Great job planning ahead and grabbing the deals! https://t.co/MJy7m1bukl
@Iskaboji https://t.co/VDxvBtaZcu
@kmottawa Please Email us your details, booking number and screen shots so we can look into this. Sorry for the frustration. Support@flyflair.com

data.text: @Malcolm_J @JaBlamo Changes to a booking can be made on the website. Or you can send a DM with your booking number and details. The team will get to you but it takes time due to the high demand.
@jamneria Yes. The DMs go into the system for the customer support team along with other communications. They are working through them and connecting with customers.
@hharteveldt @careyarms There is support. Twitter DMs go into the support team along with other channels. They are in a queue and handled by the customer support team.
@bliptane Use the online form and provide your booking details. This will time stamp your request and the team will process it: https://t.co/zGEwvnPuwx
@careyarms @hharteveldt We are processing many requests and working with customers via the online form and will continue throughout the weekend: https://t.co/zGEwvnPuwx
@isherrysingh We appreciate you sharing and have the team working on this. We apologize for the frustrating experience.

data.text: @LoreneHat The customer service team is working and responding to DMs and emails, however, it is taking time given the large volume of communications. Send you booking number and details and they will be able to assist.

@MegM15667205 They all feed into the system which time stamps them. Cancellations can be made within 24 hours of booking as long as the trip is more than 7 days away from booking. https://t.co/KijETnUmGL
